item.description:
## Note * As of this version Irony supports analyze mode for HOI4. If you see any bugs in how Irony detects any definitions there please report on the issue tracker. * Stellaris collections with patch mods are not backwards compatible with older versions. I seriously mean it; importing a collection made in v1.21 will not be recognized in say v1.20.
## Current Release Notes * Fix certain cases where xdp-open didn't work on linux * Fix #362
## Release Notes 1.21 * Update dependencies * Minor fixes * Add conflict solver analyze mode only * Add option to export hash analysis report to clipboard * HOI4 conflict solver analyze support added (hopefully with no parser mapping errors) * Conflict solver reset conflicts notifications, indicators and filter * Enhance dds image handling * Optimize binary image preview

## Note * As of this version Irony supports analyze mode for HOI4. If you see any bugs in how Irony detects any definitions there please report on the issue tracker. * Stellaris collections with patch mods are not backwards compatible with older versions. I seriously mean it; importing a collection made in v1.21 will not be recognized in say v1.20.
